alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 3:03PM EST until January 30 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Wicomico, Somerset, Inland Worcester County, and the Maryland Beaches. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Wind will combine with cold temperatures to create dangerously cold conditions for exposed skin.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico
